extendedInfo.description: Popular kids games from iphone, is  now on android for free !!!UPDATE  version 3.x.x - now contains 3 games!!!Preschoolers really connect with our Linking coloring book game. It teaches children to Recognize and Pronounce numbers and letters of the alphabet and numbers in a kid-friendly way.Linking coloring book contains 10 images. You can play with with numbers or letters + unlimited random mode.Your child will love playing Linking coloring book, and you'll be Able to relax, Knowing your child is learning while having great fun.This app is optimized for phones and tablets.More games/images will be added soon.
